page.title: 02SCOUT GROUP, SOUTHWELL
page.content: The Southwell{Scout Group}consists of: 1. A{Venture Unit,}consisting of thirty members aged between fifteen and nineteen years of both sexes. They meet each Friday, and have a varied programme of activities throughout the year. 2. A{Scout Troop}consisting of of 4O boys aged between 1O\ and 15. They meet each Thursday night, and their activities consist of map reading, pioneering, wide games and camp cooking. Two of the main events of the year are the winter weekend and the summer camp. 3. There are three {Cub Packs}consisting of about twenty boys in each between the ages of 8 and 1O\. They meet on Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday evenings, and they prepare for becoming Scouts. A new Scout H.Q. will be built in 1986 thanks to the efforts of many leaders and parents.
